short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple, one-click extensions with updated standings from the 2021-2022 NBA season

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With just one click, check the latest 2021-22 NBA standings complete with record, games behind, and win streak in both the Eastern and Western conferences. The NBA Standings Extension has an intuitive user-interface with clear text, minimal distractions, and no ads! When you're done, simply click out and go on with your day. It's that simple! Data gathered from data.nba.net.
